attributes.action: abolish in its entirety the liability to pay Chancel repairs under grounds that it could affect people of a denomination not supported by teh Church of England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a non-Christian, I feel it is discriminatory to request the payment of chancel charges in the event that I purchase a piece of property deemed as liable for the rectory.  

The act passed in 2003 only serves to further cloud these ancient and frankly ridiculous laws, which detract fully from the role of the Church in modern society, and cause harm to attempts to inject funding into rural areas most heavily impacted as a result of suspicion around property transactions
